FuncDef:
The collector command configures an analyzer with a specified ID in the system view.
The undo collector command cancels the configuration of the analyzer with a specified ID in the system view. The collector command configures an analyzer with a specified ID in the system view. The undo collector command cancels the configuration of the analyzer with a specified ID in the system view. By default, no analyzer is configured in the system view.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the analyzer ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 5.
